content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to Shaquille O'Neal's personal thoughts or plans. However, it is not uncommon for public figures to explore different genres of writing throughout their careers. Shaq has already written several children's books, which require a significant amount of creativity and imagination. It is possible that he may consider branching out into writing fiction for adults if he is interested in exploring that genre. Regardless of the genre, it could be interesting to see what kind of stories he could come up with and what unique perspectives he could bring to the world of literature.
